title: Seizing the opportunity of transformational change
description: With FRTB's final implementation date of end-2019 on the horizon, banks are looking to respond swiftly and effectively to the challenges posed by the new FRTB framework. In this forum sponsored by CompatibL, Murex and Numerix, a panel of market risk practitioners explores the revolution in data, advances in technology and rethinking governance, trading structures and hedging strategies
